about_the_game:
WHAT IS SUKI SUKI LOVE?

SUKI SUKI LOVE IS A PSYCHOLOGICAL HORROR REALITY SHOW, WHERE DISCOVERING THE SECRETS AND SINS OF ITS PARTICIPANTS WILL LEAD YOU TO A DARK AND INEVITABLE ENDING.

WILL YOU BE ABLE TO KNOW THE TRUTH THAT HIDES BEHIND THIS WORLD?

DEMO

Ready for a small taste, my dear mortals? In the demo of Suki Suki Love, you’ll take your first steps through this secret-filled academy and meet the enigmatic Keiko, whose sweet demeanor masks a deeply shadowed past. Each decision will guide you toward unexpected temptations, while I—Artemesia—watch your every move with great interest. Will you dare to continue once you discover what truly awaits behind each door?

Features:

  • Featuring jaw-dropping animations!

  • Unique melodies for each character and situation!

  • Memorable characters.

  • All scenes and characters in Full HD (1080p).

This game contains disturbing content and is therefore not suitable for children or sensitive or impressionable people.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains disturbing content and is therefore not suitable for children or sensitive or impressionable people.

name: Suki Suki Love Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 (64-bit version recommended)
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 9.0 compatible card (most modern integrated graphics cards are compliant)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Support for playing music/effects
  • VR Support: no

short_description: Welcome! I'm Artemesia, your charming host in this reality show set in an academy that hides more than meets the eye. Every decision could lead you to redemption... or damnation. Do you dare to unravel its mysteries and face your own?
